item.description:
This special event will merge the healing energy of Qi Gong with the healing energy of Gongs and Singing bowls. We will practice simple energy exercises with breath work while the Conduit a group of vibrational alchemists, are offering a "sound bath and inward voyage"

These gongs send vibrations through your body massaging you at a cellular level. The sound of the gong itself can create the possibilities for deep automatic meditation and relaxation. Singing gongs in this respect becomes very therapeutic, providing an environment for self-healing.

The event will be from 7-8 pm
$15 per person.

Contact owen at 860-888-4314 or Erik at 860-593-8397 for more information.

www.gongtheplanet.com
item.why: Feeling the energy from the universe merging with the vibration of the gongs is pure bliss.
item.name: Qi Gong the Planet
